CommitComments.CommitComment: repositioning lenz template so that it's less pretty and more functional for 1024*768 resolutions

added tool tips for the country lists
update of project properties with flash 9.0.47 requirement
setting return type of setObject from nothing (ie, "") to void

new background images, cleaned up User Pref blade
